duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute the consistent movement of inventory throughout the supply chain at competitive costs within required performance levels.
Review, oversight, and execution of TMS submission accuracy and revisions.
Adapt and adjust routing plans and activities as production plans, inventory levels, or performance expectations are modified.
Proactively develop contingency planning to minimize disruption across the supply chain network.
Research, solve, and communicate collaboratively with internal and external customers.
Recommend and escalate internally to adjust from plan, as appropriate, to support required service levels, costs controls, and inventory levels.
Accountable to manage and resolve third party's performance issues, working with the provider to modify issues in progress to meet required expectations.
Regularly review and hold carriers accountable for improvements to performance levels.
